premium.description: You are currently subscribed to Bible Strong Sponsor. You have access to the following features
Soutenez l'application, Devenez un spons: Support the application, Become a sponsor!
Vous devez être enregistré pour accéder: You must be registered to access the subscription offer.
Êtes-vous vraiment sur de supprimer cett: Are you sure you want to delete this database?
Si votre base de données a été corrompue: If your database has been corrupted, remember to restart the application once the files have been downloaded.
J'ai regroupé ici la plupart des questio: I have grouped here most of the questions that are regularly asked to me.
Si l'application est lente sur votre tél:
If the application is slow on your phone, I'm sorry. Bible Strong uses lexicon and dictionary databases that contain thousands of entries. Generally recent phones have good performance on the application. 

I will optimize some parts of the app like the lexicon and the dictionary in the future.
L'application prend beaucoup de place: The application takes up a lot of space
J'ai fait le choix de vous fournir le le:
I have chosen to provide you with the lexicon, the Bibles and the offline dictionary to facilitate quick access. 

The advantage is of course the fast and offline access of all your information, the drawback is the size of the application. 

 ~ 25Mo for the dictionary, ~ 30Mo for the Hebrew lexicon. Each bible weighs around ~ 5MB.

 In the whole application can reach up to 200MB, so make sure you have room.
faq.bugNoticedAnswer: To avoid overloading the team's solo developer, only sponsors can submit bugs using the link "Submit a bug " in the "Plus " section.
faq.whiteScreenQuestion: I have a white screen when I want to read the Bible
faq.whiteScreenAnswer: This bug seems to appear on certain phone models (Tecno, Infinix ...).If you have an Android 6 or lower version, you can update Android System WebView in the Play Store.
faq.ideaAnswer: To avoid overloading the team's solo developer, only sponsors can submit ideas using the link "Submit an idea " in the "Plus " section.
Pourquoi l’application contient-elle du: Why does the app contain Adventist content?
L'app contient du contenu adventiste, ma: The app contains Adventist content, but also content from other faiths. I did not focus on religion, but rather on the quality of the content. For example, the Amazing Facts timeline is the only one I know of as complete. If you do not share the Adventist faith, it is normal that you may disagree with certain content.
who-are-you:
Very good question ! My name is Stéphane, I am 30 years old, I have been designing and developing web and mobile for 10 years. 

I come from Martinique, I am a Seventh-day Adventist and I am currently living in New Zealand with my wife. 

I decided to create this application because I couldn't find one that met my needs in terms of ease of use and ergonomics for studying the Bible. I wanted to organize my verses, write my studies, take my notes, see them directly integrated into my bible, create my tags, etc. 

I therefore wish to contribute to the building by offering a free application, funded by donations and sponsors. :).

Une erreur s'est produite. Réessayer ?: An error has occurred. Try again?
Voulez-vous vraiment supprimer cette étu: Are you sure you want to delete this study?
Rechercher un événement dans la Bible: Search for an event in the Bible
Vous souhaitez aller plus loin ?: Do you want to go further?
Traduction de la Chronologie biblique <2: Translation of the Biblical Chronology <2> " The Bible Timeline "</2>, courtesy of <4> Amazing Facts </4>
Comment avez-vous déterminé les dates, e: How did you determine the dates, especially the creation date?
Quelles sont vos principales sources pou: What are your main sources for the timeline?
Voici une liste des sources utilisées, e: Here is a list of sources used, among others, to create the timeline
Prévoyez-vous la date du retour du Chris: Do you foresee the date of Christ's return?
Non. La Bible dit que quant au jour et à: No. The Bible says that as to the day and time of Christ's return, no one knows. See Matthew 24; 50. Furthermore, Christ's return will only come after other prophetic achievements have occurred - and we also don't know when they will happen. The purpose of the timeline is not to predict when exactly future events will occur, but rather to show the reliability of the Bible as a historical document, its reliability in prophecy and as a tool for in-depth study of the Bible.
Une error est survenue, la base de donné: An error has occurred, the database may be corrupt. Go to the download management to redownload the database.
Une error est survenue, le développeur e: An error has occurred, the developer has been informed.
Lexique contenu les strongs grecs et héb: Lexicon contains Greek and Hebrew strongs with their concordance and definitions
Dictionnaire Encyclopédique de la Bible: Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Bible A. Westphal.
Plus de 20.000 sujets et sous-thèmes, et: More than 20,000 subjects and sub-themes, and 100,000 references to the Scriptures.
L’un des ensembles les plus complets de: One of the most complete sets of cross-references ever compiled, comprising over 572,000 entries.
Commentaires concis de Matthew Henry. Tr: Concise comments by Matthew Henry. Translation by Dominique Osché.

premium.earlyAccess.description: This feature is available in early access for sponsors. It will be available to all users in the coming weeks.
premium.renew: All subscriptions are renewed monthly automatically.You can cancel them when you wish.
premium.earnings.500.description: This amount represents the different operating costs of the app (servers, services, etc.) and increases in proportion to the number of subscribers.
premium.earnings.1500.description: With your support, I can work part-time on the application and use consultants to make it even more qualitative! The new features and improvements will be delivered faster.
premium.onemonth.min.title: Symbolic 🙏
premium.onemonth.min.description: Thank you for your symbolic help to the evolution of this project.
premium.onemonth.title: Sponsor ⭐
premium.onemonth.description: Thank you for your commitment to the evolution of this project and your desire to invest yourself financially.Thank you warmly for your support.
premium.onemonth.max.title: ✨Premium✨ Sponsor
premium.onemonth.max.description: The manna fell from the sky! It is a blessing to see that you believe in this project and that you are ready to invest yourself financially.Thank you warmly for your support.
premium.sponsorsOnlyFeature: This feature is reserved for sponsors.
premium.sponsorsOnlyOption: This option is reserved for sponsors.
app.syncError: An error occurred while synchronizing your data. Please save your data manually
app.exportDesc:
Normally your data is automatically synchronized, but in some cases it may happen that you need to do it manually. 

When you export your data, a file is created on your phone. You can then share it by email or other means of your choice.
app.importDesc:
The import file must be in SAVE.BIBLESTRONG format and contain data from your account. 

WARNING, imports crushes all existing data. Make sure you have a recent backup before continuing.
donation.title: Offer your support
tips.chapterSelector: You can open a new tab by long pressing on the chapter number.
tips.manual-backup: To prevent any data loss, you can manually export your data in the Import/Export tab
